description: This file contains utility functions for reading property values, file contents, checking file types, searching files recursively with pattern matching, and expanding variables within strings. It serves as a helper module within a larger software project, providing file I/O and string processing functionalities.

methods.name: bool readPropertyFromFile(const char * filename,const string & property,string & propertyValue)
methods.description: Reads a property value from a specified file. Supports recursive expansion if the property value begins with '$'.

methods.name: bool readFileContent(const char * filename,string & content)
methods.description: Reads the entire content of a specified file into a string.

methods.name: bool isRegularFile(const string & path)
methods.description: Checks whether a given path corresponds to a regular file.

methods.name: bool searchFilesRec(std::vector<std::string> & pathList,unsigned int currentDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Recursively searches directories for files matching a pattern, with exclusions and result cap.

methods.name: bool searchFiles(string & inputPath,int maxDepth,int minDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Initiates a recursive file search starting from a given path, with depth controls and exclusions.

methods.name: bool ExpandPropertiesInString(const char * input,const char * filePath,string & expandedString)
methods.description: Processes a string to replace variable placeholders with their values read from a specified property file.

ctags.pattern: /^inline bool readFileContent(const char* filename, string& content)$/

ctags.signature: (string & inputPath,int maxDepth,int minDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)

ctags.signature: (std::vector<std::string> & pathList,unsigned int currentDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
